Commands.Jugulating Wasp: 2-hit melee BRV attack  Deals extra damage to targets afflicted with Poison, Venom  Self: 3 turns ATK Up I  3 turns BRV Attack deals extra damage to targets afflicted with Poison, Venom
Commands.Shadow Fang: 4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack  Deals extra damage to targets afflicted with Poison, Venom  Target: Fair chance 3 turns Poison
Commands.Bhavacakra: 4-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack  Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%  Consumes 3 Ninki   While Bhavacakra equipped:   • BRV Attack, HP Attack grant 1 Ninki   • Jugulating Wasp, Shadow Fang grant 2 Ninki  While Ninki at least 3:   • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Ninki)   • Bhavacakra becomes Bhavacakra+   (consumes 3 Ninki after use)

Artifacts.Debuff Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% while an enemy is debuffed
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Artifacts.Mighty Jugulating Wasp: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Jugulating Wasp by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Shadow Fang: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Shadow Fang by 10%

Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy
Passives.Jugulating Wasp Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Jugulating Wasp
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits
Passives.Shadow Fang Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Shadow Fang
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Passives.Trick Attack: Slightly raises BRV damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self
Passives.The Indiscriminate Rogue: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense while an enemy is poisoned
Passives.Debuff Initiative: Moderately raises SPD while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Jugulating Wasp Extension: Jugulating Wasp use count +3When using Jugulating Wasp:   Slight damage boost   Moderately increased damage when attacking targets afflicted with Poison, Venom   Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit   Slight ATK Up boostWhen using BRV Attack after using Jugulating Wasp:   Moderate damage boost   Slightly increased damage when attacking targets afflicted with Poison, Venom   Target: High chance 4 turns Poison
Passives.Debuffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Shadow Fang Extension: Shadow Fang use count +1When using Shadow Fang:   Tremendous BRV damage boost   Moderately increased damage when attacking targets afflicted with Poison, Venom   Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%   Slight Poison hit rate boost

Weapons.Yoshimitsu CP: 35: When using  Shadow Fang :- Raises BRV potency- Raises the success rate of  Poison  and improves it- Grants  Small Max BRV Up  for 6 turns
Weapons.Banos Del Sol CP: 15: When using  Jugulating Wasp :- Raises BRV potency- Extends the duration of  Small Attack Up - Extends the duration of the BRV damage boost on poisoned targets
Weapons.Nagi CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Bhavacakra
